question: [File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-manager/src/status_page.rs] [Function: status_page()] [Information Disclosure] Does the unauthenticated status page endpoint expose sensitive internal state information about fullnode versions, data service instances, and stream metrics that could aid attackers in reconnaissance or targeting specific services? (Low)

(Low)
